alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 10:59AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gulf and southwestern Franklin Counties through NOON EDT/1100 AM CDT/... At 1059 AM EDT/959 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Port St. Joe, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apalachicola, Port St. Joe, Nine Mile, Eleven Mile, Thirteen Mile, Odena, Indian Pass, Tilton, Beverly, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, Bay City, Apalachicola Airport, Creels, Simmons Bayou and Hays Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf
